description: This succulent easy glazed ham recipe, which only has four ingredients, will have everyone thinking you spent hours in the kitchen.
name: Easy Marmalade-Glazed Ham Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Cover loosely with foil and rest for 30 minutes. To serve, transfer ham to a platter, wrap shank in muslin and decorate with rosemary.
